name: Chain Broker
description:
Get into the chain making business! Make money by connecting the green dots. Larger dots are simpler, smaller dots returns more money. You can use also the red dots, but these work the other way around: larger costs more money.

Step in at the right moment, make money, don't get bankrupt and stay in business!

Take care: slowly business goes faster and faster...

Enjoy!

Made for https://itch.io/jam/retroverse-jam-1/
